choices.A: Virtual environments can move compiled modules between different platforms.
choices.B: Virtual environments permit non-administrative users to install packages.
choices.C: The application code is run in an environment that is destroyed upon exit.
choices.D: Virtual environments allow for stateful high availability.
choices.E: Virtual environments prevent packaging conflicts between multiple Python projects.

questions.question_text: What are two advantages of Python virtual environments? (Choose two.)
